ingredients.ingredient: 1 large head broccoli, cut into florets
1 pinch onion powder, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Slice garlic thin so it cooks evenly without burning during roasting
Spread broccoli in a single layer to maximize contact with the hot pan
Watch carefully in the last few minutes to prevent garlic from becoming bitter
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What temperature and time would you recommend for roasting this broccoli until tender-crisp?
